channel.title: Special Attacks Problem - Reward
channel.description: I have this problem with my special attacks... 1. I click the special attack 2. The special is preformed, and the energy is drained 3. The energy comes back [b]BUT:[/b] The bar itself never goes down! It always stays full. [b]Reward: [/b][i]Moderator position on LeScape Pk V2 (not LeCaverns) [/i]

item.title: Special Attacks Problem - Reward
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Ok

Read full topic

item.title: Special Attacks Problem - Reward
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Hmm,
you have all these?

item.title: Special Attacks Problem - Reward
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

I have this problem with my special attacks…

  1. I click the special attack
  2. The special is preformed, and the energy is drained
  3. The energy comes back
    BUT: The bar itself never goes down! It always stays full.
    Reward: Moderator position on LeScape Pk V2 (not LeCaverns)

Read full topic
